body:
Love how the chieftain just go "hands off" after he's groping while she's making speech. Well, since volume 1 he seems to have special interest on Silva, more than to the other girls. Seeing several other older works by Ninoko, seems to be the artist's style. Rapey, but actually likes the girl and will take responsibility. I hope they do become couple and travel together, even if she's still being tsundere. 

A thing I'm more curious is actually from volume 2. Some of his lines implied he might be from other world, so this is his isekai story.
I love how the MC keeps gently bullying the elf girl.
level 3 is out now yet no single translation for this series.. watdefak!?
man, I was hoping for a scene with the chieftain
